channel.title: My JAVA version. Does it qualify?
channel.description:
Okay, here is everything about my Java... [IMG]http://i4.tinypic.com/5yldwug.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i15.tinypic.com/4kebngz.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i16.tinypic.com/4uucap2.jpg[/img]
PLEASE observe the above images carefully to understand my topic with greater knowledge! ---- Now, I know this has been asked a million times and there's numerous topics about this, but I receive the 'Javac' is not recognised as an internal or external, command or batch file when I run "compile" files.
NOTE: Also, I have this folder: C:\Program Files\GTK+ Runtime Environment (Which I assume is GDK)
I have tried to follow the guidelines specified in the topics, but nothing helps. I would like someone to tell me my Java qualifies for making a server (Running Compile). Will I need to download this: [url=https://sdlc6b.sun.com/ECom/EComActionServlet;jsessionid=6DDF5D9FD83DCE24B05B8890CD3FC191]J2SE(TM) Runtime Environment 5.0 Update 11[/url] PLEASE BE 100% SURE!!!
If so, what do I have to write for a PATH and CLASSPATH in environment variables? I need the exact adress and stuff...
If you have any questions about my problem, please post them!
THANKS!!!! Unholy Angel

item.title: My JAVA version. Does it qualify?
item.dc:creator: @Unholy_Angel Unholy Angel
item.description:
@Unholy_Angel wrote:

LINK = J2SE™ Runtime Environment 5.0 Update 11
Does that link support my needs?

Read full topic
item.source: My JAVA version. Does it qualify?

u need jdk … java developing kit… u see all your jde…u need a jdk folder

item.title: My JAVA version. Does it qualify?

item.description:
@Unholy_Angel wrote:

Okay, here is everything about my Java…


PLEASE observe the above images carefully to understand my topic with greater knowledge!

Now, I know this has been asked a million times and there’s numerous topics about this, but I receive the ‘Javac’ is not recognised as an internal or external, command or batch file when I run “compile” files.

NOTE: Also, I have this folder: C:\Program Files\GTK+ Runtime Environment (Which I assume is GDK)

I have tried to follow the guidelines specified in the topics, but nothing helps. I would like someone to tell me my Java qualifies for making a server (Running Compile). Will I need to download this:
J2SE™ Runtime Environment 5.0 Update 11 PLEASE BE 100% SURE!!!

If so, what do I have to write for a PATH and CLASSPATH in environment variables? I need the exact adress and stuff…

If you have any questions about my problem, please post them!

THANKS!!!
Unholy Angel
